LanguageData.WantNewAnimal.label: wants new animal

LanguageData.WantAnimalCompagny.label: wants animal compagny
LanguageData.WantAnimalCompagny.descriptions.0: Our colony needs some animation, to be around animals would brighten my heart!
LanguageData.WantAnimalCompagny.description: To fulfill this [tier] you need {Amount} animals.
LanguageData.WantAnimalBond.label: wants to bond an animal
LanguageData.WantAnimalBond.descriptions.0: I would like to have a strong bond with an animal!

LanguageData.WantMilkableAnimal.label: wants milkable animals
LanguageData.WantNewBond.label: wants to have a new bond with an animal

LanguageData.WantNewPet.label: wants new pets

LanguageData.WantMajesticBond.label: wants to bond a majestic animal
